prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Drums, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1: This song features Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Pipe.

Style 2: This composition has Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3: No Pipe is included in this song, but it does have Guitar, Bass, and Drums.
